about_the_game:
The Beasts of Bermuda - Original Soundtrack contains all of Beasts of Bermuda's in-game music. As development continues and we add more music to Beasts of Bermuda, new music tracks will also be added to this OST.

Additionally, owning this DLC package will give access to multiple dance emotes that can be used in-game! Obtaining this OST will provide access to the following emotes:

  • Megaraptor

  • Saichania

  • Ichthyovenator

  • Palaeophis

  • Velociraptor


The tracks are in MP3 and FLAC format.

The discovery soundtracks are the soundtracks that play when the player first enters a biome. Included in FLAC format is a compilation of all Isla Titania tracks merged into one long track.
